question: Imagine a dance inspired by the movements of a jellyfish. What would it look like, and can you generate an image of it?

steps.content: Imagine a dance inspired by the movements of a jellyfish. What would it look like, and can you generate an image of it?
Plan: 1) Describe the dance inspired by a jellyfish. 2) Generate an image of this dance. 3) Return the description and image.
Generating an image of a dance inspired by the fluid and undulating movements of a jellyfish.
Image of a dance inspired by jellyfish movements generated.
The dance would involve fluid, undulating movements, mimicking the graceful pulsations of a jellyfish. An image of this dance has been generated.

true_answer: The dance would involve fluid, undulating movements, mimicking the graceful pulsations of a jellyfish. An image of this dance has been generated.
